Package familymapserver.data.access

Class AuthTokenAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • familymapserver.data.access.Access
      • familymapserver.data.access.AuthTokenAccess
  • public class AuthTokenAccess
extends Access
    Contains methods for accessing authorization token data in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AuthTokenAccess​(Database db)
      Creates a new AuthTokenAccess object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(AuthToken authToken)
      Adds a new authorization token to the database.
      void clear()
      Removes all authorization tokens from the database.
      protected void createTableIfMissing()
      Creates a new table to hold authorization tokens if it doesn't already exist in the database.
      java.lang.String getUsername​(java.lang.String token)
      Gets the username of the user with whom the token is associated.

      • AuthTokenAccess

        public AuthTokenAccess​(Database db)
        Creates a new AuthTokenAccess object.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(AuthToken authToken)
         throws DBException
        Adds a new authorization token to the database.
        Parameters:
        authToken - the authorization token to be added to the database
        Throws:
        DBException - if a field is missing or invalid, if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername​(java.lang.String token)
                             throws DBException
        Gets the username of the user with whom the token is associated.
        Parameters:
        token - an authorization token value
        Returns:
        the username of the user with whom the token is associated, or null if there is no authorization token with the given token value
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • clear

        public void clear()
           throws DBException
        Removes all authorization tokens from the database.
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • createTableIfMissing

        protected void createTableIfMissing()
                             throws DBException
        Creates a new table to hold authorization tokens if it doesn't already exist in the database.
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs
